main.name: Christine
main.bio: Doing this coding bootcamp at Monash University has been life-changing. Never did I thought I could go back to coding and doing what I love again after being in Technical Support and Managerial roles in the last 9 years. I took up Computer Science in college and knew that creating applications and leveraging technology to make life a little bit easier is what I have always wanted to do. Sadly, life has gotten in the way and I got sidetracked. So here I am, trying to find my feet again in the world of software development - and I couldn't be more happier!
